  • Method Details

    • newKeyPair

      public String[] newKeyPair(String outBase)
      Generates a new ECDSA (Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm) Key Pair

      Parameters:
      outBase - Defines the Key Pair return base format (e.g., "base58" OR "base64").

      Returns:
      a String Array with the ECDSA Key Pair in base64 or base58 format.
      • The first element (return[0]) is the Private Key in the format defined in base parameter.
      • The second element (return[1]) is the Public Key in the format defined in base parameter.

    • keyToString

      public String keyToString(net.i2p.crypto.eddsa.EdDSAPublicKey edDSAPublicKey, String outBase)
      Converts an ECDSA Public Key Object in a String base format.
      Parameters:
      edDSAPublicKey - Receives an ECDSA Public Key Object.
      outBase - Defines the output String format (e.g., "base58" OR "base64").
      Returns:
      The Public Key in the String base format. The base is defined in the outBase parameter.

    • keyToString

      public String keyToString(net.i2p.crypto.eddsa.EdDSAPrivateKey edDSAPrivateKey, String outBase)
      Converts an ECDSA Private Key Object in a String base format.
      Parameters:
      edDSAPrivateKey - Receives an ECDSA Private Key Object.
      outBase - Defines the output String format (e.g., "base58" OR "base64").
      Returns:
      The Public Key in the String base format. The base is defined in the outBase parameter.

    • keyToFile

      public void keyToFile(String keyInBaseString, String filePath)
      Exports a String Base well-formatted Key to a file.
      Parameters:
      keyInBaseString - Receives a Key (Public OR Private) in String Base format.
      filePath - Receives the file path.

    • stringToEdDSAPrivateKey

      public net.i2p.crypto.eddsa.EdDSAPrivateKey stringToEdDSAPrivateKey(String strPrivateKey, String base)
      Converts a String Base well-formatted Key in an ECDSA Private Key Object.
      Parameters:
      strPrivateKey - Receives a String Base well-formatted private key.
      base - Defines the input String format (e.g., "base58" OR "base64").
      Returns:
      A ECDSA Private Key Object.

    • stringToEdDSAPublicKey

      public net.i2p.crypto.eddsa.EdDSAPublicKey stringToEdDSAPublicKey(String strPublicKey, String base)
      Converts a String Base well-formatted Key in an ECDSA Public Key Object.
      Parameters:
      strPublicKey - Receives a String Base well-formatted public key.
      base - Defines the input String format (e.g., "base58" OR "base64").
      Returns:
      A ECDSA Public Key Object.

    • importKeyFromFile

      public String importKeyFromFile(String filePath)
      Imports a String Base well-formatted Key from a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Receives the file Path.
      Returns:
      A Key (Public OR Private) in String Base format.
